body:
I suggest at the very beginning of this test we set varies settings based on workspace.has_hip_support:
```
if workspace.has_hip_support:
   device_option = hu.hip_do
   engine = 'MIOPEN'
else:
   device_option = hu.gpu_do
   engine = 'CUDNN'
```
, instead of inlining the workspace.has_hip_support check in multiple places.
